alert.note: Alert for Bay; Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 14 at 5:39PM EST until December 14 at 6:15PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southeastern Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southwestern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 515 PM CST. * At 438 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 15 miles west of Panama City Beach, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Panama City Beach, West Bay, Inlet Beach, Seminole Hills, Port Washington, Seaside, Pine Log, Sunnyside, Bunker, Laird, Laguna Beach, Hollywood Beach and Seagrove Beach. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
